member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters
member.summary:
Parameters to configure the
algorithm.

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor using reasonable default values.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters.MaxModelPoints
member.summary: Number of points from the model point cloud to retain and use. Higher numbers tend to lead to much higher processing times. Good start values are in the order of 500.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters.MaxScenePoints
member.summary: Number of points from the scene point cloud to retain and use. Higher numbers tend to lead to much higher processing times. Good start values are in the order of 500.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters.MaxDistanceStdDev
member.summary: Maximum distance(in unnamed point cloud units) at which two points shall be considered corresponding. Point correspondences are selected up to MeanDistance + (MaxStdDevDistance * StdDevDistance). A reasonable value to start with is 1.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters.DeltaThresholdRms
member.summary: Root mean square distance between the model and scene point cloud at which to stop the iteration. A reasonable value to start with is 1e-6.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters.MaxIterations
member.summary: Number of iterations at which to stop (unless the criterion has been reached already). A reasonable value to start with is 20.

member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentResult
member.summary: Result of a Match3D alignment operation.

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentResult.#ctor(Stemmer.Cvb.AffineMatrix3D,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Ctor

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentResult.Transformation
member.summary: Transformation which maps the scene to the model.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentResult.RootMeanSquareDistance
member.summary: Final root mean square distance between model and scene.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentResult.NumIterations
member.summary: Number of iteration steps it took to align the model with the scene.

member.name: P:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentResult.IsUnreliable
member.summary: If true, then the result is not reliable because too few matching points were found.

member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align
member.summary: Functionality of the CVMatch3D.dll.

member.name: T:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align.MatchParameters
member.summary: Parameters for matching point clouds.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align.MatchParameters.MaxIterations
member.summary: Maximum number of iterations to be executed.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align.MatchParameters.DeltaRmsThreshold
member.summary: Iteration stops if deviation of RMS from former iteration is below this threshold.

member.name: F:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align.MatchParameters.MaxStdDevDistance
member.summary: Point correspondences are selected up to meanDistance + maxStdDevDistance * stdDevDistance.

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align.DownsampledPointClouds(Stemmer.Cvb.PointCloud,Stemmer.Cvb.PointCloud,Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.AlignmentParameters)
member.summary: This function matches the PointCloudScene to PointCloudModel by the iterative closest point algorithm (ICP) presented by Arun KS, Huang TS, Blostein SD 1987 in their pater "Least-squares fitting of two 3D point sets.", IEEE Trans Pattern Anal Machine Intell 9:698â€“700.
member.exception: if one of the input point clouds is null
if one of the input point clouds has already been disposed

member.name: M:Stemmer.Cvb.Match3D.Align.RootMeanSquareDistance(Stemmer.Cvb.PointCloud,Stemmer.Cvb.PointCloud)
member.summary: Calculate the root mean square distance of two point clouds.
member.param: Model point cloud to calculate with.
Scene point cloud to calculate with.
member.exception: if one of the input point clouds is null
if one of the input point clouds has already been disposed
